trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived"></xref> event or <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理的方法<xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived"></xref>事件或<xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataReceivedEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 DataReceivedEventHandler 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously collect the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream output of a process, add your event handler to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要以非同步方式收集的重新導向<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>程序的輸出資料流中，加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived>事件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: These events are raised each time the process writes a line to the corresponding redirected stream.
trans-unit.target: 每次處理程序將某行寫入至對應的重新導向資料流時，會引發這些事件。

trans-unit.source: When the redirected stream is closed, a null line is sent to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 重新導向資料流關閉時，null 的列會傳送至事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that your event handler checks for this condition before accessing the <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 確保您的事件處理常式檢查此條件存取之前<xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the `static` method <xref:System.String.IsNullOrEmpty%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to validate the <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A> property in your event handler.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用`static`方法<xref:System.String.IsNullOrEmpty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>驗證<xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A>事件處理常式中的屬性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A> </xref:System.String.IsNullOrEmpty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
